title.rendered: YEONPHOM USB C to Lightning Cable 3M 2Pack MFi Certificate iPhone Charger Compatible for iPhone 12 Pro Max/Mini/11 Pro…

content.rendered:
FQA:

1. What is Power Delivery?

USB Power Delivery (PD) is a fast-charging specification, designed to be a extra common charging normal for smart-phones and different gadgets. By standardizing charging specs, PD permits a single sort of charger to fast-charge all kinds of gadgets, eliminating the necessity for a number of chargers with various outputs.

2. Why isn’t my telephone fast-charging?

To guarantee your machine is suitable with quick charging, please affirm the next:

– Your machine helps Power Delivery (PD)

– Your charger helps Power Delivery (PD)

If you have got confirmed the above and your machine nonetheless doesn’t fast-charge, please tell us and we are going to do our greatest to help you.

(*12*)

Durable Design

Special pressure aid design, can bear 8000+ bends in strict laboratory checks. Premium Aluminum housing makes the cable extra sturdy.

PD Fast Charging Cable

Deliver a high-speed cost up to 3A (max) with the USB-C PD charger, cost for your iPhone 12 from 0% to 50% in 30 minutes.

High Quality Material

Nylon braided defend offers stronger safety and versatile efficiency for the cable.

Read more

Note:

  • The Power Adapters that support fast charging: with Apple 18W / 29W / 30W / 61W / 87W USB-C wall charger.
  • Devices that help quick charging: for iPhone 8 or later fashions help quick charging, earlier fashions solely help regular charging

⚡Fast Charging & Data Sync: The USB C lightning cable helps PD Fast Charge for iPhone 12 Pro Max/12 Pro/12/12 Mini/11/11Pro/11Pro Max/XS Max/XS/XR/X/8 Plus/8, cost to 50% in 30min. Data supply reaches to 480Mbps, environment friendly to transmit music, file, image and video briefly time.
⚡High Quality: Aluminum shell and Tangle nylon braided jacket construct the USB-C to lightning cable extra sturdy, It is versatile pull resistant, softer, lighter, extra sturdy than unique machine cables.
⚡Extra Long & Durable: This 10ft usb c to iphone cable is appropriate for completely different events, lengthy sufficient to be handy to cost your machine in bed room, couch, workplace, journey, even when you find yourself on the backseat of the automotive.
⚡Good After Sales Service: Any issues or not satisfaction with our sort C to lightning cable, please contact us, we are going to attempt our greatest to clear up the issues for you.
Note: You want a USB-C port PD wall charger (together with Apple 18W, 20W, 29W, 30W, 61W, or 87W USB-C Power Adapter) to obtain quick charging. Please kindly famous that that is usb c to lightning cable, not regular lightning cable.
